metadata.synopsis: Dialogue for Alfira in the brief interval when she can be a party member before the Dark Urge murders her.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Choose Dark Urge in CC. Start game. In Camp debug book, Queue Camp Night, keep scrolling until you get to NIGHT_DarkUrge_MurderOfAlfira. Click on it, close the menu and end the day. Speak to Alfira, and this is the follow up if she stays the night.

0.speaker: Alfira
0.text: I can't wait to hit the road. Where will we go? Neverwinter? Oh! Can we go to Waterdeep?

3.speaker: Alfira
3.text: Hah, sorry - I'm getting ahead of myself. Let's take it one note at a time, as my teacher would say.

1.speaker: Alfira
1.text: We should probably hit the hay, although I don't think I'll sleep a wink. I can't wait to start travelling!

2.speaker: Alfira
2.text: The sooner we go to sleep, the sooner I'll get out of your sight. Just... leave me be.
2.context: NodeContext: cold, little upset. Just wants to go to sleep.

4.speaker: Alfira
4.text: I'm afraid I don't have your stamina - I'll be turning in soon. Thank you again for letting me stay.
